metaData.title: Felipe Gomes | Front-end designer & front-end developer
metaData.description: Hello, I'm Felipe, and I specialize in brand creation, digital interface design, and front-end programming. In my portfolio, you'll discover a diverse range of projects, including UX design, signage, and stationery design.

hero.title: Hello. I'm Felipe.
hero.subtitle: I'm a Brazilian interdisciplinary designer & front-end developer.

about.title: About me
about.description: I have been part of teams that launched web applications for clients based in various countries, including the United States, Brazil, and Portugal, across a range of industries.
about.cta: For more information, check out <Link>my resume</Link> detailing my experiences, academic background, and skills.

AboutPage.title: I work with brand creation, digital interface design and frontend programming. Here you can find UX, signage, paper goods and packaging projects.

intro.title: Over 10 years in communication and technology sectors.
intro.p1: I have worked on teams that launched web applications for clients such as Great Pet Care (Covetrus, USA), The Anxious Pet (Covetrus, USA), Arajara Park (CE, Brazil), Ficou Pequeno (RJ, Brazil), Little Brown Mouse (SP, Brazil), and 4A (Porto, Portugal).
intro.p2: As a front-end professional, I possess expertise in HTML, CSS, Typescript, and MySQL. Currently, I utilize React/Next with Tailwind, Prisma, and Postgres. On the design side, I excel in UX, UI, usability, prototyping, and branding.

Arajara Park.description: I managed marketing projects, schedules, and budgets for Arajara Park. Our coordinated campaigns and presentation enhancements at key contact points broadened the brand's regional reach and clearly conveyed core offers and values, impacting sales and customer relationships.

Oowlish.description: I collaborated remotely on the development of the Great Pet Care and The Anxious Pet portals. We customized WordPress themes, plugins, and widgets to meet needs aligned daily with clients in the United States.

Pé de Sonhos.description: My role spanned from website creation and development to involvement in diverse projects, including signage, print advertising, branding, newsletters, email marketing, and social media management.

Onespacemedia.description: I was responsible for creating interfaces and programming websites. My focus was on transforming design concepts into interactive digital experiences optimized for various devices and browsers.

Piloti Mobile & Internet.description: I was responsible for creating interfaces and programming websites. I implemented interactive solutions with HTML, CSS, and jQuery and maintained direct contact with clients from various sectors.

Languages.title: Languages
Languages.value: React, Next, Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, PHP, MySQL

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.value: Responsive Apps, Accessibility, Build & Deploy, API Integration

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.value: Prototyping, Colors, Typography, Photography, Branding, UX, SEO, Design System

Contact.title: How can I help?
Contact.subtitle: Get in touch
Contact.titlePage: If you’re interested in my work, please get in touch.
